Description: Papyrus written with black ink with loan agreement dated to day 10, month of Pauni, year 21 of Apries. The writing is abnormal hieratic, 8 lines on recto and 2 on verso. Thompson's MS Catalogue (presenting it as demotic): "Acknowledgement of a money loan by Ns-'y(?) son of Zeho to Zekhe son of Tes-Mont".
Curator's comments: Bibliography: M. Malinine, 'Choix de textes juridiques en hiératique 'anormal' et en démotique (XXVe-XXVIIe dynasties)' (Paris, 1953), 15-19; K. Donker van Heel, 'Abnormal Hieratic and Early Demotic Texts Collected by the Theban Choachytes in the Reign of Amasis: Papyri from the Louvre Eisenlohr Lot' (Leiden, 1995), no. 23. Cf. entry in www.trismegistos.org - DAHT. Being studied as part of PhD by Elisabeth Greifenstein (University of Wuerzburg).
Bibliographic references: Parkinson 1999 / Cracking Codes: The Rosetta Stone and Decipherment (22)
Reich 1914 / Papyri juistischen Inhalts in hieratischer und demotischer Schrift aus dem British Museum (p.5-8, pl.1-2)
Malinine 1953 / Choix de textes juridques en hiératique "anormal" et en démotique I: Traduction et commentaire philolgique (p.15-9)
Malinine 1983 / Choix de textes juridiques en hiératique anormal et en démotique II (p.5-6)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (46065) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/46065)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: bleached, fractured, loss Black ink Backed: brown paper Unsupported locally displayed in Room 63 until 1997 Displayed in Room 61 from 2001 until 2007 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair
